DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the study is to compare the growth of infants fed standard infant formula with infants fed a reduced calorie and protein formula.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Early Nutrition on Growth
DOC.criteria: good health singleton birth with gestational age 3742 weeks infant's birth weight >or = to 2500 grams exclusive breastfeeding or exclusively formula feeding within a defined geographical boundary mother has no problems communicating in English adverse maternal, fetal or infant medical history congenital disease or malformation affecting growth or development illness or social problems in mother or infant temporary residents
